body: Because they no longer care. In the past year conservatives have seen a frighteningly sudden shift from almost-libertarians to authrightism and fascism, some even advocating a return to monarchy. Free speech, gun rights, free markets, rights, and "rugged individualism"as it's called are no longer important to them. Their current mission is to establish strict law and order and enforce "traditional values", especially in the area of families and gender roles. This fluke mirrors a similar incident when the formerly libertarian millennials went ballistic and somehow completely reversed their politics, becoming radical leftist SJWs, communists, and PC-police. I have no idea how either of these happened or how it's even possible. But it shows you just how untrustworthy and unpredictable people are. And now we have two main platforms which are indistinguishable in every area except for which side of a few debates they're on.

A guild all about the United States of America, also known as United States or the USA. Post news, memes and discussion about the US of A here!

There are only 4 rules here:
- No NSFW posts.
- **No posts made by bots.**
- Posts must relate to part, or all, of the United States of America in some way.
- Follow the Ruqqus TOS.

For memes and shitposting about everything that happens in our beloved "Official Ruqqus Discord"
 
---

## Posting Rules


Rule 1: 

This guild is for shitposting about people/events in the Ruqqus Discord server. Any post that is not related to this will be kicked to +general. If you need help regarding the discord server, +askruqqus, +general, or +hub would gladly accept your questions.


Rule 2:

No spamming. Spamming would be considered any of the following:

* Same-format posting within a day

* Same-content posting within a day (Same content, different format)


Spammed posts will get kicked and repeated offenses results in being exiled.


Rule 3: 

No reposts: reposts are cringe. Any reposts will be kicked.

body: My problems literally get dismissed immediately because people see a man with problems and think he's either being manipulative or a weakling who deserves it. We're supposed to show no weakness, all responsibility, no emotion, no complaining, or we're just a whiny spoiled brat, no matter how bad our situation is. Even people who purposely try to treat people equally, including me, do this because it's such a firmly rooted primal instinct. Our brains aren't wired to care about the expendable male.

I blamed people dismissing my problems as me trying to get attention or troll on that, because human brains are not wired to care about the expendable male, thus one voicing his problems is perceived as an annoyance, but the opposite is true for females. You may *think* you treat everyone equally but your primal instincts skew your perception before you can even process it.

body: Women are way more pampered than you think. Most of them are like spoiled children who believe everything they're told and demand they be handed everything on a gold platter. They act this way because society actively encourages it. You can see how men, even young boys, are expected to be "tough" and show no weakness, no problems, no feelings, and stay out of the way. Women on the other hand are taught all their lives to get whatever they want by crying and bitching, and everyone will rush to fix everything for them. Even in the justice system, women usually get off for criminal acts, even heinous ones, while men are punished as harshly as possible. So you see that women act this way not because they're stupid, because they're actually quite smarter in most areas, but because they are spoiled so much more often by society. Why is this you may ask? Because the female is biological far more valuable and less replaceable than the male. Therefore, both sexes revolve around and benefit the female, and our primal instinct is to nurture and value the female as much as possible. Even I, someone who hates this misandrist behavior, do it, because it's such a hardwired instinct. Everyone feels bad when a woman gets hurt but a man getting hurt is just something that happens every day and life goes on. This is the whole reason you want so badly to protect and provide for women in fact, because your primal instincts say they're worth more than you. It's not as if women aren't capable of being independent, because they clearly are, but our primal instincts recognize them as inherently worth more and thus we feel that they deserve to be handed everything by us. Are they worth more? Absolutely not, but nature thinks they are and our primal instincts reflect that. No wonder men kill themselves 4x more often.

Women on the other hand are taught all their lives to get whatever they want by crying and bitching, and everyone will rush to fix everything for them. Even in the justice system, women usually get off for criminal acts, even heinous ones, while men are punished as harshly as possible. So you see that women act this way not because they're stupid, because they're actually quite smarter in most areas, but because they are spoiled so much more often by society. Why is this you may ask? Because the female is biological far more valuable and less replaceable than the male. Therefore, both sexes revolve around and benefit the female, and our primal instinct is to nurture and value the female as much as possible. Even I, someone who hates this misandrist behavior, do it, because it's such a hardwired instinct. Everyone feels bad when a woman gets hurt but a man getting hurt is just something that happens every day and life goes on. This is the whole reason you want so badly to protect and provide for women in fact, because your primal instincts say they're worth more than you. It's not as if women aren't capable of being independent, because they clearly are, but our primal instincts recognize them as inherently worth more and thus we feel that they deserve to be handed everything by us. Yeah I will take your word for it on a completely uncheckable factoid. Not to mention that most prominent scientists were celibate/single for most of their lives, only dedicated to their pursuits. Sure, it’s been women all this time, you smoothbrain. 

Women can now vote and run for gov’t and look how quick the world is falling apart. Why? Cause women are easily manipulated, easy to lie to, easy to indoctrinate into ratting out even their own fucking family, they have little to NO logical processing, show them a sad image and a sob story and they’ll flock to vote for, and pledge allegiance to the dictators. 

Women are actively encouraged to study these days and the bulk chooses useless faux-careers such as social studies, women studies, philosophy, or whatever else bullshit they go for. 

Sure, some women are exceptional at some stuff. But more so than men, respectively? No. At best they can hope for a similar level of intelligence, but not surpass it. 

Give me a fucking break.

body:
> Wait what, if I'm the only person that thinks you're a leftist then what even is this thread?

I'm not seen as a leftist, I'm seen as a degen libright retard.

> The issue is how did you just get this easily trolled by being called a leftist?

You're the one who got trolled, Mr. Everyonebutmeisanaltleftist. I just think your accusations are laughable.

> You're straight up one of the ruqqus cabal members too though, like CarpathianFlorist and Hannahwotsit.

I'd *love* to hear how that's the case. They all hate me and cap even threatened to ban me twice for opposing their special treatment and hyposcrisy. Go on, I'm enjoying this.

body:
# **!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!** 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣

You're literally the only person who thinks I'm a leftist. Unadulterated free speech, gun rights, hating government, thinking taxation is theft, how much further left can you get?

Tell me, if I was really just a drama inducer and an alt of a power user on AHS, then why would I spend 2 years exposing every little bit of info I could about them, and get the worst bans ever handed out on reddit for doing so? If I were really a sockpuppet why do the admins revile me so much? I bet you're one of the ones who thinks FSW and TJM and all the other WRD mods are leftist AHS shills too. Darn, you caught us red handed.

body: Except all the scientific evidence proves otherwise. It's just the natural order of life. Who has always done all the hard work and sacrificed themselves for the other? Who has always been more shallow and boring? Whose biology makes them enhance pain, anger, and negative emotions and numb positive feelings? Who looks ugly? Who has all the responsibilities and no rewards on their shoulders? Whose mental health does both society and their own brains and bodies neglect? Who has lost their childlike brilliance and mental talents in exchange for physical ability? Who gets saved last in a crisis? Who gets 10x the consequences for the same things the other half of the world would get off easy for? Who kills themselves nearly 4x as often? The answer to all of those is men. Nature DOES NOT CARE about men, even our own bodies are designed to benefit the female more than us, because she holds the more valuable organ. All of nature and life therefore revolves around her, including us men. It's awful.
